dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_interact_05_p1: I learned to fight in the slums. And on the way down, after. I've always had to look out for myself.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_interact_06_p1: I think some people still run with the old gangs, but the structure fell apart pretty quickly after The Fall.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_interact_07_p1: I know ghosts exist. I've seen them. Down here, in the darkness.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_interact_08_p1: After the Fall, it all just seemed so pointless. I just kind of left and wandered downwards.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_interact_09_p1: There's some really beautiful places in the City you know. I thought it was just a place, but I think it has a personality of its own.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_interact_10_p1: I want to believe there's a some kind of meaning to this all.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_interact_11_p1: I'm just a guy, but I feel like I can help a greater purpose here.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_interact_12_p1: I don't know why I heard the spirits. Maybe they just called out to someone and I was listening.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_interact_13_p1: It was not really possible to not be associated with a gang where I grew up.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_interact_14_p1: I don't blame anyone for what they had to do to survive after the Fall.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_interact_15_p1: The temple gardens are so peaceful. They remind me of the Ground.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_meet_01_p1: You look like someone who needs use a bodyguard.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_outside_01_p1: I'm starting to get used to this, traveling these empty streets.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_outside_02_p1: Where do you want to go next?
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_story_apocalypse: I think the spirits helped build the City. And they will help building our space shuttle. We'll be fine.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_story_escape_01_: Well, I think if you want to find a way out the City then you need to get down to the Ground. I'm just not sure it's a good idea to go outside.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_story_escape_02_: I'll follow you down to the Ground, but I'll stay in the City.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_story_escape_sta: We went to the Ground looking for an escape from the City, but found a reason to stay instead.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_story_find_green: I think if we found a Greenhouse we could make our own medicine. We should search for one.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_story_find_spiri: I know this is going to sound weird.. But I keep hearing these voices. They're friendly. Encouraging.
They're clearer now, close to the Ground. I think they are trying to lead me somewhere. Can we try to follow?
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_story_gangs_comp: Red Hats? Oh, so this is where they were. Their leader escaped from prison maybe a year before the Fall.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_story_greenhouse: I have a feeling about that Greenhouse. It's hard to explain. I know nothing about growing plants. But I think it's going to take more than seeds to make them work again.
We need to reach the Ground. Find out if anything is still growing there.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_story_search_spi: Let's get back to the Ground.
It's not clear but.. I think we should head {direction}
It sounds like they are somewhere {direction} of here
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_story_seen_store: What do you think the Government was stockpiling for?
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_story_spirits_fo: I knew I wasn't imagining it. There's something down here. I'm glad it's friendly.
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_story_spirits_in: Do you ever hear voices that seem to be calling from somewhere deep in the City?
Sometimes I think I'm imagining things. Sometimes, I think there's something out there, trying to talk to me. Us.
I know it sounds crazy, but let's keep our eyes open out there okay?
dialogue.explorer_unique_gambler_story_spirits_ou: That grove was magical. I mean. I feel like.. I feel humbled, but happy at the same time.
Ever since we visited that grove, I feel like I'm a tiny part of something bigger. Something ancient, and holy.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_01_p1: I've lived in the Dark Levels my whole life.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_02_p1: There used to be very few people in the Dark Levels. Not it's starting to feel almost crowded, ha.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_03_p1: They say there are ten bats to every human here in the dark levels. But they are very good at staying out of sight.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_04_p1: The Ground is a beautiful, magical, wild place.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_05_p1: Back in the day, your Government left people down here alone and we left you alone.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_06_p1: Look, it's just my opinion, but I think you'd be better off staying here in the City.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_07_p1: Bats are excellent messengers. But you have to treat them with respect! They owe you nothing.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_08_p1: I believe magic comes from us, people, and the things we put value in. Rituals work because we believe in them.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_09_p1: I hope your Government didn't doom us all with whatever they did up there.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_10_p1: Do you think you will ever return to the Surface?
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_11_p1: Nothing quite like a good cup of strong coffee before heading out.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_12_p1: I never knew what I signed up when I joined you, but I'm very glad I did!
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_13_p1: Before the Fall, my people, the Doma, were the only nomads in the City. Now, everyone is one.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_14_p1: Some of my people would consider me a traitor for joining up with you. But I say strange times call for strange measures.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_interact_15_p1: You should avoid spending too much time in direct sunlight, it's dangerous.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_outside_01_p1: The Dark Levels weren't all dark before, you know. Some areas had lights.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_outside_02_p1: We have a long way to go, better not linger.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_outside_03_p1: I like it better out here than in the camp.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_story_apocalypse: I think I will stay behind in the City. But you should go. We shouldn't bet everything on the same horse right?
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_story_escape_int: So you want to reach the Ground? It is not easy, but certainly possible. You must traverse many levels. I will help you find the way.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_story_escape_nea: We are getting close to the Ground now.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_story_escape_out: Here we are! The Ground. It's something else, eh? Are you still planning to try and leave the City?
I see. Well, if you want to go looking for an exit, you're on your own. I will stay in the City.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_story_rescue_abs: Sunita will be alright. She knows how to take care of herself.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_story_seen_store: Seems like your Government was preparing for some kind of a catastrophe. And then.. all this happened.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_upper_levels_01_: I've never been above level 14 before.
dialogue.explorer_unique_handler_upper_levels_02_: Don't you feel queasy thinking how high up from the Ground we must be?
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_event_01_p1: I would be delighted to join you.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_01_p1: I have spent years alone in the Dark Levels, seeking for Truth in meditation. But I now believe you cannot find it alone.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_02_p1: I am very curious about what caused the Fall. But I suspect that ultimately it was divine intervention. A signal for us to do better.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_03_p1: I am grateful that you have accepted me to your community.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_04_p1: The Governor preached human progress, but no real progress was made. We became complacent.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_05_p1: This tribe can become a fresh start for humanity.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_06_p1: Did you know that back in the City States period, Etrurians had their own little state within the City? I would like to see the ruins one day.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_07_p1: I never saw any ghosts or spirits in my years in the Dark Levels. But that doesn't mean they don't exist.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_08_p1: According to the teachings of my religion, this planet was created for humans to govern. But perhaps we did not govern it well.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_09_p1: Members of my church often spent some time in the Dark Levels. But I stayed longer than most.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_10_p1: I sometimes get nervous around this many people, but it makes me glad to see this tribe prosper.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_11_p1: I believe God is watching very closely what we are doing here. This might be our last chance to save humanity.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_12_p1: In order to learn from humanity's past mistakes, we should try to understand what caused the Fall.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_13_p1: I believe these spirits are but a facet of God.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_14_p1: I grew up in the Slums. My mother died when I was young. My father was.. not often there. My church was the best family I ever had.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_15_p1: I am happy I have been able to be a part of your journey.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_interact_directio: If I remember right, there used to be an emergency passage to the {direction} of here..
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_meet_01_p1: I would be delighted to join you.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_outside_01_p1: There is comfort in the darkness.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_story_apocalypse_: Human life is sacred. If leaving this planet is what it takes to preserve it, then we must do that.
dialogue.explorer_unique_hermit_story_fall_exodus: A secret Government operation was scheduled for the date of the Fall? Sounds like they forgot they are human too and tried to play gods.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_event_01_p1: I have been wandering on my own for too long.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_01_p: I used to be a journalist. Now I am just someone who can't let a story go.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_02_p: I want to know what caused the Fall. I think it's related to a story I was investigating before.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_03_p: I would like to tag along when you go exploring.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_04_p: I wonder if any of my colleagues from the magazine are still alive, out there somewhere.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_05_p: It's important to collect and preserve what evidence we can about the Fall while it's still fresh.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_06_p: I want to bring whoever is responsible for the Fall to justice. Even if they are long dead - history needs to know.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_07_p: As a journalist, you learn to navigate the City. But it has changed since the Fall. Sometimes I find it very hard to orient in the darkness.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_08_p: There's so much information lost because the Network is down. We have to investigate the old fashioned way.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_09_p: You're a Surfacer right? Where did you grow up? I am originally from District 24.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_10_p: I was in prison on Level 5 when the Fall happened. It was pretty chaotic afterwards.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_11_p: I was imprisoned for poking around Government facilities. It made me even more curious about what they were up to.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_12_p: After I escaped the prison, I swore to find out what caused The Fall.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_13_p: Isn't it strange that all higher Government officials seem to have disappeared in the Fall?
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_14_p: I'm glad we met. You are a good person.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_interact_15_p: There are so many details, so many stories about the Fall left to uncover. I will spend the rest of my life investigating and documenting.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_meet_01_p1: I have been wandering on my own for too long.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_outside_01_p1: I wish I still had access to the Network. I could figure out exactly where we are.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_outside_02_p1: I know the Government had secret facilities in the Dark Levels. Now it could be possible to investigate them.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_outside_03_p1: Let's look for buildings that might have been constructed recently
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_story_apocaly: Not everyone will fit on the first shuttle we build. But we have to start evacuating people as soon as possible.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_story_debris_: So they launched the spacecraft, but something went horribly wrong. They must have known they were taking an incredible risk.
Countless people must have perished when that space shuttle exploded. No wonder the Government seemingly collapsed overnight.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_story_escape_: I'm glad you decided to stay in the City. Together we can figure out the story behind the Fall.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_story_evacuat: So the Government knew about the earthquakes and spacecraft was for evacuation.
I can't believe they were ready to just abandon the majority of their people and run away.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_story_fall_ex: So according to the documents you found, there was a secret space craft launch that was scheduled for when the Fall happened. Something must have gone wrong with it.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_story_fall_in: Now that we're close to the Surface there are more hints about the Fall everywhere. We should keep our eyes open and <style='highlight'>investigate</style> anything interesting we see.
We should go investigate any sites with signs of the Fall and learn more about the Exodus project, so we can build our own spacecraft.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_story_greenho: It seemed like that Greenhouse was not working, even though it had power, sunlight and water. Perhaps we need seeds?
I never thought the Ground would hold such secrets.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_story_l14_01_: Level 14 was devastated in an industrial accident long before the Fall.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_story_spacecr: We know the Government was building a spacecraft, even though publicly they were not interested in space exploration. Why?
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_story_spirits: Seems like Yimin was right about there bring ghosts in the City after all.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_story_start_p: Do you have a moment? I want to ask you something.
Before the Fall, I was a journalist. I was investigating rumours of secret facilities run by the Government in the Dark Levels.
It's not clear exactly what they were, but I know they existed. I had documents indicating their locations, but I lost them.
I'm convinced it's all connected to the Fall. Can you help me try and find those facilities?
Thank you. All these survivors, they deserve to know what really happened.
dialogue.explorer_unique_journalist_story_storeho: We have proof that the Government was preparing for something. I knew it. They knew something was coming. And they kept it secret. Why?
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_event_01_p1: I need a safe place to rest, can I come with you?
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_01_p: I lived in the Sundome but happened to be near the Ground when the Fall happened, and now I'm stuck here.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_02_p: The City is over a hundred years old, but originally it was just a few levels.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_03_p: The City is a mess right now, but it will get better. I can guarantee you that the outside is worse.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_04_p: We used lifts to commute between the research station and our homes. But they stopped working because of the Fall.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_05_p: I can't stop thinking about my sister. I'm sure she's still alive there somewhere.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_06_p: It must have been chaotic near the Surface after the Fall.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_07_p: I worked for Giga, but I was not a miner. I basically worked with a team searching for new deposits.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_08_p: Do you ever wonder what happened to all the people you used to know?
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_09_p: I had this colleague, a researcher. She was pretty secretive about here work. I have a feeling I know what it was about now.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_10_p: I will never forgive my boss who stole supplies from me and my colleagues right after The Fall and left us stranded in the Dark Levels.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_11_p: Family has always been important to me.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_12_p: In a way, you were right all along. We need to find a way out of this City.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_13_p: My sister is a dreamer. She wanted to become a model.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_14_p: Now after the Fall there's no more Surfacers and Slummers. There's just.. survivors.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_interact_15_p: After the Fall, I was stranded with a few colleagues and researchers at a station on Level 3.
Most of them didn't make it. I probably wouldn't have either, if I hadn't run into you.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_meet_01_p1: I need a safe place to rest, can I come with you?
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_outside_01_p1: Feels like we've been wandering out here for ages
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_story_apocaly: I knew mining asteroids was seriously discussed at Giga. I just didn't know we actually had the technology to send humans to space already.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_story_greenho: Fixing those Greenhouses should be our top priority. I know a thing or two about City infrastructure, maybe I can help.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_story_rescue_: I never thought I'd see you again.
Nisha seems to be happy here.
I wonder if my sister is still alive. She's not exactly a survivalist..
I know everyone has lost loved ones. But my sister.. I was supposed to be there with her.
I worry about my sister, Nisha. She is somewhere near the Surface. I wish I could go find her.
Listen, I can't sit around and wait anymore. I'm going to find my sister.
This place is eerie. Let's see if we can find a way further up.
I wish there was some way to get through Level 14.
Let's look for better equipment, maybe we can find away to explore Level 14.
I want to go to Level 14. Please. If there is a way to the Surface, I need to know.
Let's go scout Level 14. If there is a way further up, maybe I can go find my sister.
dialogue.explorer_unique_prospector_story_seen_st: Do you think the storehouse we found could be related to the earthquakes somehow? I know people at Giga were worried about them.
dialogue.locale_generic_bunker_intro_01_p1: A bunker left behind by wars long gone.
dialogue.locale_generic_bunker_intro_02_p1: After the first door, here is a second one, but its locking mechanism seems to have relied on backup power that is dead.
dialogue.locale_generic_camp_intro_01_p1: A small settlement is huddled against a tower.
dialogue.locale_generic_camp_intro_02_p1: A few tentative homes huddle together under a railway bridge.
dialogue.locale_generic_factory_intro_02_p1: The factory is a compound made of several buildings, all whose purpose is a mystery.
dialogue.locale_generic_farm_intro_01_p1: The farm consists of several identical synthfarms, stacked in a grid.
dialogue.locale_generic_farm_intro_02_p1: A great hall where the City's food used to be produced.
dialogue.locale_generic_grocery_intro_01_p1: This was once a grocery store. Thankfully, perishables seem to have been looted or cleared.
dialogue.locale_generic_grocery_intro_02_p1: The grocery has already been looted, but perhaps there is still something left.
dialogue.locale_generic_hospital_intro_02_p1: The hospital lies in disarray, as if hastily abandoned.
dialogue.locale_generic_house_intro_01_p1: The residence looks eerily untouched, like someone might come home soon.
dialogue.locale_generic_house_intro_02_p1: The dwelling looks like it has been empty since before the Fall.
dialogue.locale_generic_junkyard_intro_01_p1: The old junkyard is an intimidating chaos of husks and piles.
dialogue.locale_generic_junkyard_intro_02_p1: The bots that used to run the junkyard lie among the clutter, abadoned like all the rest.
dialogue.locale_generic_lab_intro_01_p1: Some kind of a laboratory was located here.
dialogue.locale_generic_lab_intro_02_p1: You lockpick your way past a heavy door and enter a pristine laboratory.
dialogue.locale_generic_library_intro_01_p1: The entrance hall of the library is impressive, but barren.
dialogue.locale_generic_library_intro_02_p1: Your footsteps echo in the empty library.
dialogue.locale_generic_maintenance_intro_01_p1: You enter through a heavy round door to a narrow and tall room with several cabinets.
dialogue.locale_generic_maintenance_intro_02_p1: The {name} looks pristine, as if still operational.
dialogue.locale_generic_market_intro_01_p1: You have a good feeling about finding something useful here.
dialogue.locale_generic_market_intro_02_p1: The {name} has been abadoned for a long time.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_claustrophobia_p: You find yourself in a long and narrow corridor and being to feel trapped.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_darkness_p1: As you wander in the vast blackness, you lose your sense of direction and start to panic.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_dialect_p1: They speak a dialect you struggle to understand at first, but they are gracious.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_draft_p1: The draft slams a door shut.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_glass_p1: The floor is covered in broken glass.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_guards_p1: Guards greet you warily as you approach the settlement.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_identical_p1: You search room after identical room.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_ladder_p1: The ladder to the second level is broken but there are various pipes and fences.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_lost_p1: You get lost in the endless corridors. {explorerName} eventually finds you.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_pillar_p1: A fallen pillar blocks the way
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_remains_p1: You spot human remains. Someone tried to camp here after the Fall, but didn't make it.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_rot_p1: The kitchen is a rotten mess, but there is a storeroom that looks more promising.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_spoiled_p1: The shelves are full of things, but they are mostly useless, or spoiled.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_stair_p1: A stair breaks under your foot, but you catch the railing.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_tight_p1: There is very little space between the control panels.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_wall_p1: A section of the compound is separated by a solid wall and you can't find a gate.
dialogue.locale_generic_obstacle_watcher_p1: You cant shake a feeling that you are being watched.
dialogue.locale_generic_office_intro_01_p1: The elevator is out of order and there are many floors.
dialogue.locale_generic_office_intro_02_p1: The office building looms large and lifeless.
dialogue.locale_generic_restaurant_intro_01_p1: You walk through the main door to an elegant dining room.
dialogue.locale_generic_restaurant_intro_02_p1: You enter the restaurant through the back door.
dialogue.locale_generic_store_intro_01_p1: You enter the small store through a back door.
dialogue.locale_generic_store_intro_02_p1: This was once a grand flagship store.
dialogue.locale_generic_tradingpartner_intro_01_p: A large sign stands outside the settlement, bearing its name.
dialogue.locale_generic_tradingpartner_intro_02_p: Guards greet you warily as you approach the settlement.
dialogue.locale_generic_transport_intro_02_p1: You enter the {name}. At first glance, the place seems looted clean.
dialogue.locale_generic_warehouse_intro_01_p1: As the doors reluctanly open, you find yourself in a massive open space lined with shelves.
dialogue.locale_generic_warehouse_intro_02_p1: The warehouse looks fairly recently built, and must have been in use just before the Fall.
dialogue.locale_workshop_fuel_intro_p1: A fuel refinery stands hollow and quiet.
dialogue.locale_workshop_fuel_outro_p1_meta: Workers on level {campLevel} can now be assigned to work here.
dialogue.locale_workshop_rubber_intro_p1: A rubber plantation stands withered and silent.
dialogue.locale_workshop_rubber_outro_p1: The plantation is ready to be used again.
dialogue.locale_workshop_rubber_outro_p1_meta: Workers on level {campLevel} can now be assigned to work here.
dialogue.refugees_default_event_01_accept: Thank you! We will do our best.
dialogue.refugees_default_event_01_p1: We had a little settlement but it was destroyed. There's {num} of us left, can we stay here?
dialogue.refugees_default_event_01_reject: Then we'll be on our way.
dialogue.refugees_default_event_02_accept: Thank you! You will not regret this.
dialogue.refugees_default_event_02_p1: The City is unpredictable and dangerous. Could we stay here? We are {num} people, everyone can work.
dialogue.refugees_default_event_02_reject: Very well, we will look elsewhere.
dialogue.refugees_default_event_03_p1: We have nowhere else to go. We are only {num} people. Can we stay here?
dialogue.refugees_default_event_03_reject: I don't know how we will survive.
dialogue.refugees_earthquake_event_01_accept: Thank you! We'll get right to work.
dialogue.refugees_earthquake_event_01_p1: Our camp was destroyed in an earthquake. Can we stay here? There's {num} of us.
dialogue.visitor_unique_expedition_01_p1: I'm on my way to the Surface.
dialogue.visitor_unique_expedition_01_p2: A great explorer called Amanda Ettler is organizing an expedition to the Surface to find out what happened. I'm travelling to join it.

messages.explorer_level_up_message_01: {Name} found better equipment and improved their ability
messages.game_intro_message: You wake up alone in the darkness, far below sunlight. You are injured and you remember very little. Is this how your journey ends?
messages.passage_found_elevator_message: There used to be an elevator here.
messages.passage_found_hole_down_dark_message: There is a massive sinkhole here. Only vast emptiness is visible below.
messages.passage_found_hole_down_sunlit_message: There is a massive sinkhole here. A street is visible far, far below.
messages.passage_found_hole_up_dark_message: Far above in the ceiling there is a hole, a mouth leading into blackness.
messages.passage_found_hole_up_sunlit_message: Far above in the ceiling there is a hole leading to the level above.
messages.passage_found_prebuilt_message: There is a maintenance staircase here that is in good repair.
messages.passage_found_stairwell_message: There used to be a staircase here.
messages.quest_apocalypse_started_message: Agreed to look for a solution to the earthquakes
messages.quest_escape_started_message: {explorerName} offered to help find a way to the Ground
messages.quest_fall_started_message: Promised to help {explorerName} to investigate the Fall
messages.quest_greenhouse_fix_started_message: {explorerName} offered to help figure out how to fix the Greenhouse
messages.quest_rescue_started_message: Agreed to go looking for Sunita with {explorerName}
messages.quest_spirits_started_message: Promised {explorerName} to keep an eye out for ghosts

sequences.locale_generic_clinic_explorer_treatment: {explorerName} follows the doctor to another room. They return bandaged and relieved.
sequences.locale_generic_clinic_intro: A haphazard clinic set up by a doctor who is defying the post-Fall chaos by helping whoever needs it.
sequences.locale_generic_clinic_treatment: The doctor cleans and bandages your wounds briskly and urges you to stay out of trouble.

spots.story_apocalypse_cracks_01_message: There are visible cracks in the level floor itself here. Could they have been caused by The Fall, this deep? Or is the City just in a bad shape in general?
spots.story_apocalypse_cracks_02_message: There are visible cracks in the level floor here. You imagine the damage caused if a level floor collapsed, and then decide to think about something else. They are just superficial cracks. For now.
spots.story_apocalypse_cracks_log_message: Examined cracks on the level floor
spots.story_apocalypse_measuring_station_messa: A small installation with an antenna and a recorder box, installed fairly recently and still powered. It seems to be measuring something but you are not sure what.
spots.story_apocalypse_settlement_message: A haphazard post-Fall settlement, crushed under an ancient residential tower that collapsed onto it. You spot human remains and decide not to dig around.
spots.story_apocalypse_solar_panels_01_message: Massive solar panels, still providing the failing City with power for basic functions. They look a little run-down though.
spots.story_apocalypse_solar_panels_02_message: If these kind of panels are what's keeping the City's remaining lights on, they won't last many years without maintenance.
spots.story_earthquake_pillars_01_message: These massive pillars look like they were built relatively recently. They seem like reinforcements to help hold the weight of the City above. One of them is already cracked.
spots.story_earthquake_pillars_02_message: These pillars look like some kind of support structures. They have been build from a completely different material from the surrounding environment.
spots.story_fall_escape_pod_log_message: Examined remains of a transport pod
spots.story_fall_escape_pod_message: A badly damaged piece of a spacecraft, built to transport several people. Thankfully, the remains have been reduced to skeletons.
spots.story_fall_hull_wreckage_message: Wreckage from the escape shuttle. You recognize the material from the factory, still sleek and polished where it has not fractured.
spots.story_fall_sundome_shards_01_message: Sharp, glistering, human-sized shards of the sundome that used to cover the Surface.
spots.story_fall_sundome_shards_02_message: Sharp, glistering, human-sized shards of the sundome that used to cover the Surface.
spots.story_spirits_shrine_01_message: A small shrine with withered flowers and small bones against the wall of an otherwise unremarkable industrial facility. You don't know of any religion it could be related to. What is it doing here?
spots.story_spirits_shrine_02_message: Another little shrine, decorated with wooden sticks and seashells this time. It seems to have been built after the Fall. Why here?
spots.story_spirits_shrine_03_message: Another little shrine, and now you realise they all must have been dedicated to the Spirits. Someone worshipped them in the City before the Fall, even here, in the high levels.
spots.world_fall_supply_truck_message: Big white truck with emergency services logos on it and empty sacks strewn about. It is damaged and looted. Looks like it was trying to distribute supplies to refugees.
spots.world_fall_tent_village_message: A village of colorful tents arranged in neat rows, abandoned and strewn with garbage. It must have housed refugees right after the Fall, but everyone seems to have moved on.
spots.world_monument_dictatorship_message: A chipped but grand monument celebrating the defeat of the old dictatorship.

stories.apocalypse_known_message: These earhquakes are going to be a real problem.
stories.apocalypse_solution_known_message: We know what we need to do. Now we just have to figure out how.
stories.apocalypse_tech_ready_message: We now have all the technological know-how required to evacuate this crumbling planet.
stories.escape_camp_start_message: Here is good enough to rest and heal.
stories.escape_determination_start_message: As the darkness recedes, your confidence grows. You remember your goal - to find an exit and leave this dead City behind.
stories.escape_exploring_start_message: The City is endless. It continues forward and backward, up and down, layer after layer. Separated by concrete and metal, are other corridors, other buildings, tunnels, towers. Far above, the Surface, and somewhere far below, your goal - the Ground.
stories.escape_get_up_message: It takes awhile for you to make out your surroundings.
stories.escape_going_up_message: You still have things to take care of in the City.
stories.escape_healed_start_message: Finally healed and ready to travel again. You must find a way to continue downwards. The way out of crumbling maze must be on the bottom level - the Ground.
stories.escape_launch_message: And so finally you leave the City behind.
stories.escape_passage_found_message: You find a gaping hole in the level floor. Upon closer examination, it used to be a staircase. Probably some kind of an emergency exit. It requires repairs, but it could be usable.
stories.escape_passage_found_message_2: Perhaps the people at the camp would help repair this staircase.
stories.escape_passage_repaired_message: Finally, the way forward is open. If there is an exit, it is somewhere below, closer to the Ground.
stories.escape_passage_search_start_message: You have to find some way to the level below.
stories.escape_passage_used_message: One level down, one step closer to escaping this place.
stories.escape_start_message: You are alone in a massive dark corridor, far below sunlight.
stories.expedition_diary_p1: The first pages of the expedition diary describe in detail careful preparations and theories of what the expedition might find.
stories.expedition_diary_p2: The expedition begins well, with the group finding their way to the Surface easier than expected, and most of them tolerating the elements well, although some turn back at this point.
stories.expedition_diary_p3: The remaining group notices that not far from the epicenter of desctruction, in an area that in old maps is dedicated to agriculture, there are remains of a huge closed off facility.
stories.expedition_diary_p4: Upon investigating, they are suddenly attacked by guard drones, somehow still powered. They are completely taken by surprise, one killed immediately and many badly injured. Those well enough go out to seek help whereas the wounded stay behind in a makeshift camp.
stories.expedition_locale_camp_p1: The camp is very hastily set up, just a couple of lean-tos to keep the wind and the sun out.
stories.expedition_locale_camp_p2: You quickly find the remains of several people. They seem to have been badly wounded.
stories.expedition_locale_camp_p3: Name tags on their clothing confirm that they were members of the Surface Expedition.
stories.fall_found_preparations_message: Did the old Government know about the Fall beforehand?
stories.fall_locale_depot_p1: A huge and orderly storeroom, shelf after shelf carefully labelled, all empty.
stories.fall_locale_depot_p2: It doesn't look scavenged, but systemically cleared and abandoned. Someone stored huge amounts of supplies here and then took them.
stories.fall_locale_depot_p3: Everything has Government stamps. This is official. What was this all for?
stories.fall_locale_spacefactory_p1: The facility is behind tight security, and it takes awhile for you to find a safe way in.
stories.fall_locale_spacefactory_p2: At first it seems like an ordinary manufacturing plant. You realise it was used to build a flying vessel. A spacecraft?
stories.gangs_locale_compound_p1: It takes some time to get through the thick walls and locked doors of the compound.
stories.gangs_locale_compound_p2: Inside, you find some kind of a lavish hideout with quarters for several dozen people, and a luxury apartment for what must have been their leader. They called themselves 'The Red Hats'.
stories.gangs_locale_compound_p3: It seems like The Fall cut them off water, so they abandoned the place. They left behind, food, weapons, and piles of now worthless paper money.
stories.greenhouse_disease_started_message: The disease is spreading. We need to find medicine.
stories.greenhouse_greenhouse_found_message: We must continue searching. Perhaps some plants have surived on the Ground?
stories.greenhouse_grove_scouted_message: Scouted the Grove. Found a source of ancient power.
stories.greenhouse_locale_story_greenhouse_p1: The Greenhouse is dull and lifeless. Dead leaves of different shapes hint at the variety of plants that somehow, impossibly, grew here not so long ago.
stories.greenhouse_locale_story_greenhouse_p2: Something is missing. The Greenhouse will not work without a source of life.
stories.greenhouse_locale_story_seeddepot_p1: A modern facility with Futurefields logos all over. Looks like a seed bank of some sort?
stories.greenhouse_locale_story_seeddepot_p2: Something has gone wrong here. All the seeds seem lifeless, even though the backup generator is working. This will not help us restart the Greenhouses.
stories.locale_story_grove_p1: The trees seem alive. They whisper, but the words are unintelligible. You feel safe.
stories.locale_story_grove_p2: You have found a source of <style='highlight'>ancient power</style>.
stories.locale_story_isolation_center_p1: The facility is very difficult to get into but finally you find a back door that can be lockpicked.
stories.locale_story_isolation_center_p2: The facility is huge and seems to have housed a few hundred people. Everything is very modern and clean and has been deserted in good order.
stories.locale_story_isolation_center_p3: It's all too comfortable for a prison, but everything is isolated from the outside. Was this some kind of a cult? Did it have something to do with The Fall?
stories.locale_story_shelter_p1: At first the apartment appears abandoned. But you notice someone has been clearing junk and cooking here.
stories.locale_story_shelter_p2: In the back room you find Sunita and her sister, very hungry but otherwise safe. They are very happy to see you.
stories.locale_story_shelter_p3: Sunita and her sister join you.
stories.rescue_completed_message: You are grateful that Sunita is alive.
stories.rescue_explorer_left_message: Sunita left to look for her sister in the upper levels
stories.tribe_accepted_staying_message: You realise you haven't thought about leaving the City in a long time.
stories.tribe_crisis_message: What if it's true, and there's nothing outside the City?
stories.tribe_first_worker_message: The newcomer is weary but unafraid. They say they want to build a home here.
stories.tribe_growing_message: Some people are starting to call this place not just "camp", but "home".
stories.tribe_not_alone_message: You are not alone here on this level. There are footsteps in the dust, burned out torches. Perhaps someone else is looking for a place to rest too?
stories.tribe_two_camps_start_message: You build a second camp and wonder if here too people will come who wish to stay in the City and rebuild.

actions.disabled_reason_action_unavailable: Must be able to start action {action}
actions.disabled_reason_camp_exposed: Camp is exposed to direct sunlight
actions.disabled_reason_no_new_rumours: No new rumours at the moment
actions.disabled_reason_no_space_for_robots: No storage space for robots in camp
actions.disabled_reason_project_in_progress: There is already a building project in progress
actions.disabled_reason_selling_too_many_same_it: The trader doesn't want that many {itemsName}.
actions.use_campfire_failed_message: Sat at the campfire to exchange stories, but there was nothing new.
actions.use_campfire_message: Sat at the campfire to exchange stories about the corridors.
actions.use_in_market_completed_message: Visited the market and listened to the latest gossip.

camp.events_none_description: All is quiet in the camp.
camp.population_decrease_default_message: An inhabitant packs their belongings and leaves.
camp.population_increase_first_message: A ragged stranger appears from the darkness.
camp.population_increase_many_message: A group of {num} people join the camp.
camp.population_increase_outpost_message: A skeletal stranger arrives from the dark, offers to work.
camp.raid_danger_description: Risk that a raid against the camp is successful.

characters.explorer_ability_type_detect_ingredients: see crafting ingredients in current and neighbouring sectors
characters.explorer_ability_type_detect_poi_descrip: detect points of interest from further away
characters.explorer_ability_type_detect_supplies_de: see supplies in current end neighbouring sectors
characters.explorer_ability_type_scavenge_general_d: +{value} chance of extra loot when scavenging
characters.explorer_ability_type_scavenge_handler_d: double the effect of pack animals and sometimes find more
characters.explorer_ability_type_scavenge_ingredien: +{value} chance of extra ingredients when scavenging
characters.explorer_ability_type_scavenge_supplies_: +{value} chance of extra supplies when scavenging
characters.explorer_ability_type_scavenge_valuables: +{value} chance of extra valuables when scavenging
characters.explorer_injured_in_party_hint: Switch this explorer out of the exploration party so they can heal their injuries

embark.page_description: Make sure you pack enough supplies before you leave.
embark.warning_low_food_description: There won't be much food left in the camp.
embark.warning_low_stamina_description: Won't get far with low stamina.
embark.warning_low_supplies_description: Won't get far without food and water.
embark.warning_low_water_description: There won't be much water left in the camp.

exploration.action_rewards_message_locale_generic_02: In the back you find something.
exploration.action_rewards_message_locale_generic_03: You take a few items with you.
exploration.action_rewards_message_locale_generic_04: In the end you come across a few useful items.
exploration.action_rewards_message_locale_inhabited_: You get some gifts from the residents in exchange for news.
exploration.action_rewards_message_locale_storeroom_: In the back you find a storeroom with some goods.
exploration.blueprint_found_message_first: Found a piece of a forgotten technology.
exploration.blueprint_found_message_last: Found the last piece of a blueprint.
exploration.blueprint_found_message_middle: Found another piece of a blueprint.
exploration.enter_level_15_message: Only now you notice the lack of scents here, away from the Ground with its dirt and leaves. It feels barren.
exploration.enter_level_default_message: The streets are indifferent to your presence.
exploration.enter_level_escape_message: One more level down. One more step towards freedom.
exploration.enter_level_fall_message: Perhaps you will find more clues about The Fall here.
exploration.enter_level_ground_message: The floor here is different - uneven, organic, continuous. There seems to be no way further down. There are plants, mud, stone and signs of animal life.
exploration.enter_level_rescue_message: You wonder if Sunita is out there, somewhere.
exploration.enter_level_surface_message: There is no ceiling here, the whole level is open to the elements. The sun glares down from an impossibly wide blue sky above.
exploration.sector_status_no_enemies_description: There doesn't seem to be anything hostile around.
exploration.sector_status_not_scouted_description: You have not scouted this sector yet.
exploration.sector_status_passage_elevator_built_des: There is an <style='highlight'>elevator</style> here, and it has been repaired.
exploration.sector_status_passage_elevator_default_d: There is an <style='highlight'>elevator</style> here, but it is broken.
exploration.sector_status_passage_hole_built_descrip: There is a newly built <style='highlight'>elevator</style> going {direction} here.
exploration.sector_status_passage_hole_down_default_: There is a <style='highlight'>hole</style> in the level floor here.
exploration.sector_status_passage_hole_up_default_de: There is a <style='highlight'>hole</style> in the level ceiling here.
exploration.sector_status_passage_prebuilt_default_d: There is an old <style='highlight'>staircase</style> {direction} here that is in a good shape and can be used.
exploration.sector_status_passage_stairwell_built_de: There is a <style='highlight'>staircase</style> here, and it has been repaired.
exploration.sector_status_passage_stairwell_default_: There is a <style='highlight'>staircase</style> here, but it needs repair.

fight.result_fled_message_explorer: {name} distracted the enemy and allowed us to flee

log.improved_campfire_message: Made the campfire a bit cosier
log.send_caravan_start_message: A trade caravan heads out into the City.
log.tutorial_built_barracks_message: We can now recruit soldiers to defend the camp.
log.tutorial_built_beacon_message: The beacon's pale light paints the surroundings in sharp and fixed lines.
log.tutorial_built_bucket_message: Built a bucket. It will collect water.
log.tutorial_built_campfire_message: The campfire is a welcome respite from the darkness.
log.tutorial_built_cement_mill_message: Built a cement mill for making concrete.
log.tutorial_built_darkfarm_message: The snail farm will produce food.
log.tutorial_built_garden_message: The moss garden is a soothing place amid the jagged metal edges of the city.
log.tutorial_built_generator_message: The generator will make life in the camp more comfortable.
log.tutorial_built_house2_message: Repaired an old tower block. It can house several households.
log.tutorial_built_inn_message: Perhaps the inn will attract visitors to the camp.
log.tutorial_built_research_center_message: Built a research center, rivaling those old ones built by the surfacers.
log.tutorial_built_robot_factory_message: Robot factory is ready for workers.
log.tutorial_built_shrine_message: Built a shrine to the strange powers of the earth.
log.tutorial_built_square_message: The camp feels more like a town within the city already.
log.tutorial_built_stable_message: We can now send out traders of our own.
log.tutorial_built_temple_message: At the temple, people can explore this new religion together.
log.tutorial_built_tower_block_message: Repaired an old tower block. It can house several households
log.tutorial_built_tradepost_1_message: The trading post is ready, but we need to build another one to trade with.
log.tutorial_built_tradepost_2_message: Built a trading post. Our two camps now share resources and storage.
log.tutorial_built_trap_message: Built a trap. It will catch food.
log.tutorial_can_build_shrine_message: We can now build shrines to the spirits
log.tutorial_can_build_temple_message: We now have enough materials to build a temple
log.tutorial_can_make_light_message: Collected enough metal to craft a lantern
log.tutorial_encounter_blocker_type_debris_m: There is too much debris blocking the path. workers from the camp can clear it.
log.tutorial_encounter_blocker_type_explosiv: There are explosives from an old war here, blocking the way. workers from the camp can clear them.
log.tutorial_encounter_blocker_type_gang_mes: There are some pests blocking the way.
log.tutorial_encounter_blocker_type_gap_has_: There is a huge gap here, but workers from the camp can bridge it.
log.tutorial_encounter_blocker_type_gap_no_t: There is a huge gap here. need to figure out how to bridge it.
log.tutorial_encounter_blocker_type_toll_gat: There is a toll gate here guarded by gangsters. you will have to negotiate to pass.
log.tutorial_encounter_blocker_type_waste_ra: There is too much radiactive waste to continue, but it can be cleared.
There is too much radiactive waste to continue. need to learn more before you can clear it.
log.tutorial_encounter_blocker_type_waste_to: There is too much toxic waste to pass through without cleaning it up first.
There is too much toxic waste to continue. need to figure out how to clean it up.
log.tutorial_encounter_hazard_debris_message: These streets are full of debris, making them difficult to traverse.
log.tutorial_encounter_ingredient_sector_for: Scavenging here should yield some hairpins for crafting lockpicks.
log.tutorial_encounter_ingredient_sector_mes: Seems like the kind of place where you might find some crafting ingredients.
log.tutorial_encounter_level_14_radiation_me: This area is dangerous. will require much better equipment to explore.
log.tutorial_encounter_outpost_message: There are few people on this level. The camp will grow slower.
log.tutorial_encounter_sector_enemies_messag: There are some hostile creatures here. scavenging is more risky.
log.tutorial_encounter_spring_message: There is a reliable source of water here.
log.tutorial_encounter_sunlight_message: It takes some time for your eyes to adjust to the brightness.
log.tutorial_feature_unlocked_bag_message: Found a bag that allows carrying more stuff.
log.tutorial_feature_unlocked_milestones_mes: The camp is small now, but it will grow. Milestones keep track of our achievements.
log.tutorial_feature_unlocked_move_message: Might be worthwhile to explore the surroundings.
log.tutorial_feature_unlocked_upgrades_messa: Evidence and rumours can be distilled into knowledge.
log.tutorial_found_food_message: Found some scrap metal. It could be useful for crafting.
log.tutorial_found_medicine_message: Found some medicine. rare remnants of safer times.
log.tutorial_found_robot_message: Found a working robot. this could be useful back in camp.
log.tutorial_found_rope_message: Found some rope. could be useful for building and crafting.
log.tutorial_found_silver_message: Found some silver coins. some traders accept these.
log.tutorial_produced_robot_message: Our first worker robot is ready. It will help workers with their tasks.
log.tutorial_warning_first_camp_completed_me: There is not much more we can build here now, with our current abilities. best to explore the city more.
log.tutorial_warning_sundome_missing_message: This camp is exposed to direct sunlight. Many people will not want to live here.
log.use_library_message: Spent some time studying knowledge of old at the library.
log.use_shrine_fail_message: Tried to meditate, but found no peace.
log.use_shrine_success_message: Spent some time listening to the spirits.

map.level_status_all_sectors_scouted_descrip: It has been mapped, but there are unexplored locations left.
